entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix `-Wunsafe-buffer-usage` warnings #81577
  • Dotnet-counter and other tools for specifying meter and ActivitySource names should support namespace wildcards #81574
  • Crossgen hangs and crashes on MacOs #81570
  • [wasm] `SteppingIntoLibrarySymbolsLoadedFromSymbolServerRemoveSymbolServerAndStepAgain` fails intermittently on CI #81569
    8.0.0
  • HostApplicationBuilder doesn't validate DependencyInjection in Development environment if DisableDefaults=true #81566
  • [JIT] Question: typeof(T).Name doesn't become a constant? #81564
  • [MONO][TEST] runtime-llvm pipeline is not working #81563
    8.0.0
  • [wasi] Enabling icu in wasi.proj breaks tests #81560
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `System.Linq.Expressions.Tests` - `memory access out of bounds` #81558
  • Console app wont load if AspNetCore runtime is not installed #81554
  • JsonSerializer.Serialize an anonymous type, with duplicate nested names throws an unexpected exception #81550
  • SslStream_NegotiateClientCertificateAsyncTls13_Succeeds fails on non-portable builds with OpenSSL 3.0 #81546
    8.0.0
  • Unexpectedly uncaught exception in Microsoft.VisualBasic FileSystem GetLongPath #81544
  • Microsoft.DotNet.ApiCompat failing with RegexMatchTimeoutException in #81543
  • SqlException: "No column name was specified for column 1 of 't'" on IQueryable.Count() with Skip and Take #81542
  • [API Proposal]: Add support in NegotiateStream.AuthenticateAs for packageName and cancellationToken #81537
  • Advancing Metrics in .NET #81534
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 29 Regressions on 1/27/2023 11:43:56 PM #81549
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 5 Regressions on 1/27/2023 2:26:56 PM #81551
  • Regressions in System.Collections.Tests.Perf_PriorityQueue<String, String> #81553
  • JIT/opt/Compares/compares should seemingly not be passing file-check on arm64 #81531
  • [mono][aot] Preserve P/Invoked symbols when stripping #81530
    8.0.0
  • High lock contention in HttpConnectionPoolManager #81529
  • Wrong line numbers in exception stack trace on macOS/arm64 #81526
    Future
  • Reconsider version checks in collections? #81523
    Future
  • [JIT] X64 - Support containment for instructions `shlx`, `sarx`, `shrx` #81522
    8.0.0
  • [JIT] X64 - Possible comparison optimization using `and` with a small type #81520
    Future
  • Arm64 CI machines failing #81519
  • [JIT] X64 - Use containment to use memory operands for `blsi`, `blsmsk`, and `blsr` #81515
    8.0.0
  • [JIT] X64 - Recognize patterns to emit `bextr` and `bzhi` #81514
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [release/8.0-preview1] clang-9 causing build failures in linux arm64 #81555
    8.0.0
  • .NET 7 WCF Client throws exception deserializing response from .NET Framework 4.7.2 WCF Server when the response has a double with a decimal point #79092
  • XmlBinaryReader.ReadElementContentAsDouble() double.NaN deserialization issue .net7 #79056
  • VS Code - Cannot debug blazor wasm client projetc : Unable to lauch browser "The URL's protocol must be one of ws, wss or ws+inix" #80376
  • Is there any way to change Transaction's MaxTimeout or any plan to make possible it? #1418
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add a "CustomData" property to JsonPropertyInfo. #81502
  • stop linking wasm native references with --allow-undefined to warn from bugged behavior #80132
  • Make it possible to disable the built-in HTTP client logging #81540
  • Introduce symbol stripping build task for HelloiOS sample app #80977
    8.0.0
  • URI.TryCreate Does not correctly parse mailto protocol multiple to addresses #80799
  • missleading error net_io_invalidasyncresult #79700
    Future
  • Not able to access External server from inside container #80897
  • [pgo] Assertion failed '((-slop) <= diff) && (diff <= slop)' during 'Compute edge weights (2, false)' #77450
    8.0.0
  • How to resolve IL2026? #80374
  • Shouldn't a JsonIgnore property be included in JsonExtensionData property during deserialzation? #81521
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'value != 0' in 'System.Tests.DoubleTests_GenericMath:GetExponentShortestBitLengthTest()' during 'Do value numbering' #81460
  • Vector<T>.Zero.Equals(vec) produces less ideal code than vec == Vector<T>.Zero #67500
    Future
  • Suboptimal Codegen for Vector128.AsVector128(Vector2) #69298
    Future
  • JIT: Optimize "and" of small type with larger constant #7288
    Future
  • [RyuJIT] Integer Promotion Elimination on GT_CAST #8695
    Future
  • JIT stores a register in memory and taking it back while it can be avoided #40264
    Future
  • FileVersionInfo.FileVersion abnormal for C:\system32\notepad.exe #79077
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Use eager evaluation when configuring the JsonTypeInfo type graph. #81576
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Implement more opcodes in the jiterpreter #81575
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Suppress clang-16 warnings #81573
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix juxtaposed command - correct value is noted in eng\build.ps1 #81572
    community-contribution
  • Fix asserts fired during diag testing #81571
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Respect HostApplicationBuilderSettings.Args when DisableDefaults=true #81568
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [Mono] Enable AOT to print out the list of compiled methods #81567
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Remove AggressiveInlining from XxHash128.HashLength0To16 #81565
    area-System.IO
  • JIT: remove cheap preds #81562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move all of the ref-pack generators to use the "LatestVS" Roslyn build so they don't pull in prebuilts in source-build #81561
    source-build, area-Infrastructure, dev-innerloop
  • Improve ConcurrentDictionary performance, in particular for strings #81557
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • CI: Update darc dependency to track emsdk manifest name change #81556
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Add direct pinvoke module variations #81548
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add basic support for folding SIMD intrinsics #81547
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump non-existent Win10 ARM64 helix queue to Win11 #81545
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.4
  • Try to minimally light up Vector2, Vector3, Quaternion, and Plane for Mono SIMD #81541
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • . #81539
  • Fix generic parameter data flow validation in NativeAOT #81532
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Adjust workaround for event source resource stripping #81528
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Create BitArray.HasAllSet() and .HasAnySet(). #81527
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Avoid scaning the used region if there are no free units #81525
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Unify type instantiations in reflection emit #81518
    area-System.Reflection
  • Add a simple size test #81517
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: change profile slop assert to a jitdump note #81377
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow inlining for ldsfld + value-type #78736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Introduce designated direct pinvokes to mono aot compiler #79721
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/8.0-preview1] Fix ROOTFS_DIR for arm64 container in pipeline-with-resources.yml #81559
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • JIT: build pred lists when we first build the flow graph #81524
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Allow users to control behavior of undefined symbols #80495
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Introduce non-global symbol stripping in MonoAOTCompiler msbuild task #81361
    area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Delete JIT disasm output in test wrappers before running FileCheck #81538
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Tests: skip some tests on systems that don't support SHA1 signatures, like RHEL9. #81465
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Install workload manifests in sdk band version derived from the #81461
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] CI: fix the new runtime-wasm-dbgtests pipeline #81513
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, area-Debugger-mono
  • Pass -pie and -no-pie to the linker #81533
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix build for FreeBSD arm64 w/NativeAOT #81510
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove types deriving from JsonTypeInfo<T> and mark as sealed. #81306
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • [browser] javascript build cleanup #81212
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Improve the codegen of the vector accelerated `System.Numerics.*` types #81335
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Ensure that we don't try to constant fold BSF(0) or BSR(0) #81516
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Consider method accessibility in interface resolution #81409
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Delete `!CODEGEN_CPP` ifdefs from NAOT smoke tests #81474
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: build pred lists first #81448
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Remove JsonMetadataServices dependency from DeserializeAsyncEnumerable #81579
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Enable AVX512 Additional 16 SIMD Registers #79544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512, 8.0.0
  • Run nativeaot tests in helix #81439
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve XmlDictionaryWriter UTF8 encoding performance #73336
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Improve Binary Xml (XmlDictionaryWriter) performance #71478
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Modernize XmlUTF8TextWriter with u8/inline out's. #75812
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Reduce contention for Datacontract Serialization #73893
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Allow source-build to set UsingToolMicrosoftNetCompilers property #81180
  • [wasm][debug] Avoid pausing on breakpoint while invoking methods. #81162
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [wasm][debugger]Adding stack info to the exception details when evaluating expressions #81440
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Fix function pointer check #80927
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • Promote Tier0 methods with loops to InstrumentedTier0 #81051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAOT instruction for NixOS #81485
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Implement synch block fast paths in managed #81380
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Initial work to port EventPipe library to NativeAOT #80382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Enable dedup by default for iOS and tvOS #81319
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Use MemoryExtensions.Count in a few places #81325
    area-Meta
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2103288 #81359
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] wasi: Enable library tests on CI #81052
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, wasi
  • [release/7.0] Target lower glibc for Linux arm64 #80866
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Support targeting iOS platforms with ILCompiler #81476
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup intrinsinsics + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Make DotNetBuildFromSource work in more cases. #81480
    community-contribution
  • Add CollectionsMarshal.SetCount(list, count) #77794
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix TarWriter.TarEntry exception when adding file whose Unix group owner does not exist in the system #81139
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Formats.Tar, 7.0.4
  • [EXPERIMENTAL - will be reverted] Opt-in for msbuild server in CI #79444
  • JIT: Support containing compares in GT_SELECT for xarch (i.e. start emitting cmov instructions) #81267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • diagnostic to detect malformed format strings in lsg template message #81503
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Create AND chains in bool optimizer pass #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable same set of analyzers for C# tools that are used by the repo #81073
    area-Meta
  • NativeAOT Fully implements warning suppressions logic #81266
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [browser] PGO AOT samples #81221
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0][browser][http] Fix blocking of streaming response and abort #81092
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • Do not print stack trace if error reading crashReportJsonFile #81467
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Append version to RID only with valid characters #81497
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Harden and re-enable DualMode socket tests #80715
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Add new proposed API to Ancillary.Interop #81063
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-02
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • NativeAot-LLVM: Merge before putarg type removal PR 68748 #2187
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement more opcodes #2188

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Emit a warning when insufficient compiler version is used with the SDK #30304
  • Add a new item template for launchSettings.json #30302
  • [Questions] How to know the latest installed dotnet sdk version on a non sdk style project file like .vcxproj #30289

Closed

  • dotnet add command incorrect behaviour #30286
  • We need a workload team/alias #30176
  • [NETSDKE2E]With .NET 8 SDK installed, the default publish path is "/bin/Release/..." not "/bin/Debug/..." when running "dotnet publish" in CLI #30245
  • Unable to publish two Blazor projects in a solution #30092

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30306
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix dotnet new -v displaying exception callstack #30292
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Warn if the publish profile provided is not present in the project #30239
    Area-WebSDK
  • Fix bug with `dotnet publish -p:Foo` #30265
    Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30280
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #30273
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add tracking of the nuget cache to see how many files we downloaded during the test run. #29264
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update README.md #30085
    Area-WebSDK
  • Generate a call of a base class constructor if the default constructor does not exist. #30264
    Area-GenAPI
  • Add Visual Basic module template #30139
  • Refactor allowEmptyTelemetry to use Items and support hashing #30269
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • Fix up 'CurrentTargetFramework' usage error #30212
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [WIP] Workload Clean #30266
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Consider having enums auto-implement IEquatable<T> #2349
  • Champion "Type Classes (aka Concepts, Structural Generic Constraints)" #110
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Clarify restrictions for accessing captured primary constructor parameters in a readonly context. #6938

Merged

  • Publish notes for roles WG 2023-01-25 #6919

Updated

  • Add roles spec covering static extensions #6880

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Source Generation silently crashes when using wrong compiler version #66681
  • Simplify closure conversion using ref fields #66680
  • BlockSyntax capturing - cannot detect in declarations #66676
  • FindCallersAsync not able to find all the callers specially protected one #66671

Closed

  • VB: IDE hangs when Intellisense auto-complete is invoked on semantically invalid code. #24261
    Backlog
  • Code fixes (at least use auto property) doesn't respect tabs vs spaces settings #25407
    Backlog
  • C# alias intellisense trouble #25978
    Backlog
  • Empty type in peek definition for tuples #29523
    Backlog
  • TODO comments show false positives #31166
    Backlog
  • "Invert if" removes newlines #42715
    Backlog
  • Convert local function to method does not respect ref return type #32975
    Backlog
  • F12 on `using` should navigate to object's `Dispose( )` method #37842
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix formatting issue with convert-to-full-prop #66686
    Area-IDE
  • Handle captured primary constructor parameters in readonly context. #66685
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • ⚡️Share AssemblyloadTestFixture on Framework #66684
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't overwrite binary logs in CI #66683
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66682
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add some EE and EnC tests for primary constructors #66677
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.6 #66672
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Fix XmlDocumentationProvider to return the entire XML node #66668
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Split normalizer tests #66590
    Area-Compilers, Test, Community, Next
  • Continued analyzer assembly loading work #66612
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • NRT enable a language service #66679
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66675
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Enable publishing from a dev branch #66678
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Support goto def to a Dispose method when on a 'using' statement #66659
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to main #66674
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66673
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to main #66665
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update Project.HasSuccessfullyLoadedAsync logic #66569
    Area-IDE
  • Preserve spacing on trivia for invert if #66660
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #66669
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66670
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Preserve refkind when converting local function to method #66661
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Reduce copies in shadow load #66662
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66666
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.6 #66664
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #66663
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Test/implement more aspects of primary constructor parameter capturing. #66583
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors

Updated

  • Parser semicolon in initializer expression error handling #65256
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update CSharpErrorFactsGenerator to be a source generator #65192
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Avoid directory enumerations in DeleteLeftoverDirectories #66656
    Area-Analyzers
  • Add support for `using alias = any_type`. #50167
    Area-Compilers, DemoContent
  • Fix extraction inside anonymous function #66158
    Area-IDE
  • Create a README for CLaSP #66083
    Area-IDE
  • Targeting IDE projects to .NET 6 #66655
    Area-IDE
  • Automatically visit lambdas without conversion in nullable walker #66637
    Area-Compilers
  • Convert language-specific option types to records #66633
    Area-IDE
  • Add VerifyMethodBody helper as a replacement of VerifyIL #66536
    Area-Compilers
  • Semantic snippets - `propg` and `propi` snippets #65979
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Avoid compacting TransformNode's state table #66643
    Area-Compilers
  • Promote regular item to "Preferred" state #66278
    Area-IDE
  • Move all Document Outline update operations to background thread #65641
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Net 7 Kestrel windows service hangs after a period of time #46422
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef #46421
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #46420
  • Switch Debian11 Amd64 helix queue to Debian12 once msquic is available #46418
    Infrastructure
  • Add $schema to launchSettings.json for all project templates #46416
  • Improve testing experience for identity #46415
  • Set up benchmarks for RequestDelegateGenerator and build times #46414
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Deeper nested WebApplicationFactory.WithWebHostBuilder instances aren't disposed correctly #46413
  • Files not found/ failed integrity check when deploying Hosted Blazor WASM app to IIS Express #46410
  • SignalR Redis Cluster scale-out: Message throughput scalability #46408

Closed

  • Improve missing database experience for SPA apps #37324
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Add JwtBearerOptions to achieve Multi-Tanency in .NET 6 During Runtime #46281
    .NET 8 Planning
  • aspnetcore-browser-refresh.js:234 WebSocket connection error when running Blazor WASM project #46167
  • [Blazor WASM] An exception occurs while rendering multiple components that use IJSStreamReference #45799
  • Add asterisks for required input fields #45505
  • [AOT] Fix Blazor AOT warnings #45473
  • [AOT] Clean up AOT warnings in the SPA Proxy project #46036
    Backlog
  • Add support for `Finally`-like API to WebApplicationBuilder #45360
  • Disable named pipes transport on non-Windows platforms #46231
    8.0-preview2
  • `ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT` no longer overrides `DOTNET_ENVIRONMENT` #46325
  • Link generation incorrect, either ambient values ignored or incorrect url generated #44624
    Discussions
  • Recognize FromQuery.Name when generating URL #45285
    Discussions
  • Question: Does Blazor Identity work inside an iframe? #46017
    Discussions
  • CSS Isolation tags mismatch #45958

PullRequests

Created

  • Introduce the IResettable type. #46426
  • Delete Interop.FunctionalTests.ChromeTests #46425
    area-runtime
  • Re-enable ChromeTests in Interop.FunctionalTests #46424
    area-runtime
  • Update Debian11 Arm64 queue to Debian12 #46419
  • Bump http-cache-semantics from 4.1.0 to 4.1.1 in /src/Components/test/E2ETest #46409
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Add initial parameter support to RequestDelegateGenerator #46407
    area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Update Selenium to 4.8 and 109 #46423
    8.0-preview2
  • Fix casing in Api template #46329
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview2
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2103215 #46417
    8.0-preview2
  • Mark SPA Proxy as not for publication in SPA templates #46406
    8.0-preview2
  • Update references to System.IO.Pipelines #46360
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.39
  • Restrict named pipes transport to be Windows only #46366
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview2
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2102131 #46391
    8.0-preview2
  • Removed unnecessary comma #46405
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview2

Updated

  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Exclude regex and alpha constraints when SlimBuilder is used. #46227
    area-runtime
  • Defer search for dev cert until build bind time #46296
    area-runtime
  • Add support for response writing to RequestDelegateGenerator #46291
    area-web-frameworks
  • [Draft] Do a test run on new Debian12 image #46273
    area-infrastructure
  • SDK Bump to `8.0.100-alpha.1.23077.6` #46328
    area-infrastructure
  • Add schema support infrastructure #46300
    area-identity, 8.0-preview2
  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Changing reflection-based json configuration #46303
    area-web-frameworks
  • Added operation cancel operation #46330
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Remove 'max-age' in 'Cache-Control' Response Header when Location is None ('no-cache'). #42706
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Improve IFormCollection.Items documentation #44372
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Clarify some comments on RateLimiterOptionsExtensions #44855
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Improve Win bundle installers' UI #45935

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • I can not see MAUI project type in VS 2022 #13099
  • Add an alternate style for desktop / mouse #13098
  • 20x performance hit on Mac #13097
  • [iOS] Images in CollectionView are not getting loaded correctly the first time, until you scroll the list or click [Back] and open the page again #13096
  • ListView IsVisible Strange Behavior #13095
  • Maui Blazor template lacks entitlements necessary to submit to Apple macOS store #13094
    Backlog
  • Grid - Label Height calculation is wrong #13092
    Backlog
  • Android keyboard not hiding if open a new page with Navigation.OpenModalAsync #13088
    Backlog
  • Implementation error in settings manager with .NET MAUI #13085
  • [Android] Crash binding the CarouselView CurrentItem #13084
    Backlog
  • Automatically add the Get Task Allow entitlement to Mac Catalyst apps when building for debugging #13080
    Backlog
  • [M1] 7.0 Maui Blazor app displays blank on iOS 16.2 simulator. #13077
  • ListView GroupHeaderTemplate produces blank headers on iOS and MacCatalyst #13076
    Backlog
  • 创建新项目时，找不到“MAUI”选项 #13075
  • FlexLayout not working after update #13074
    Backlog
  • [iOS] CollectionView multi-select pre-selected item VisualState error #13072
    Backlog

Closed

  • FlexLayout no longer works on iOS/Android #9274
    .NET 8 Planning
  • MAUI should expose x:Name as AutomationId to accessibility tools (like VS accessibility checker) #12913
  • Documentation - add advanced sample for every control and also screenshots for this sample #6011
  • Cursor is trapped in text field during fast text copying/text input. #13064
    Backlog
  • CSS hot reload fails in .NET MAUI Blazor app after 2nd edit #9197
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Grid children default ZIndex is wrong #7752
  • EmptyView of CarouselView isn't displayed on Android #13069
  • Newtonsoft.Json deserialization fails in Release build, works fine in Debug build #13033
  • WinUI fails to deploy with error #13071
  • Reassigning Picker.ItemsSource does not trigger refresh of page #12891
  • EvaluateJavaScriptAsync does not work if WebViewRenderer is used #9211
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Obsolete Picker.MapReload #13091
    area/controls 🎮, control-picker
  • Remove TargetIdiom #13090
    t/breaking 💥
  • Remove Deprecated Application.Properties #13089
    t/breaking 💥

    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃
  • Remove PhoneDialer.Default #13079
    t/breaking 💥, area/essentials 🍞
  • [Android] Fix Html text rendering issue #13078
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-label

Merged

  • [net8.0] Fix format net8 #13081
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update CONTRIBUTING.md #13093
  • fix: Fixed nullable annotations for WeakEventManager. #12950
    community ✨

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #13070
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix Download build warning #13067
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix EvaluateJavaScriptAsync using Compatibility WebView Renderer #12901
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • added monochrome element to the AdaptiveIconDrawableXml #12564
    community ✨

Updated

  • Add HttpClient factory for UriImageSource #10995
    area/image :framed_picture:, community ✨
  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    partner/cat 😻, area/setup 🪄
  • [Essentials] Geolocation foreground listening #9572

  • Replace MessagingCenter in AlertManager #12910
